trans-unit.source: Represents a WCF configuration element for a web service application.
Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebHttpEndpointElement"></xref> class.
Gets or sets whether automatic formatting selection is turned on.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if automatic formatting is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the type of MIME content of the data sent by a web service operations.
A string that contains the name of a MIME content.
Creates a new endpoint of type <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpEndpoint"></xref> with the specified contract description.

An object of type <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> that specifies what an endpoint communicates to the outside world, including the signature of the operations in terms of messages exchanged, the data types of these messages, the location of the operations, and the specific protocols and serialization formats that are used to support successful communication with the service.
A service endpoint.
Gets or sets whether a condition is enabled that allows code injection into web pages viewed by other users.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if access is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the default format for responses sent out from a web service operations.
A format object.
Gets the type of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpEndpoint"></xref>.
A type object.
Gets or sets the flag that specifies whether a FaultException is generated when an internal server error (HTTP status code: 500) occurs.
Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the flag is enabled; otherwise returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets whether help is enabled.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if help is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the web service host name and URI matching rule that is configured in the binding element and used by transports such as HTTP, TCP, and named pipes when dispatching incoming messages.
An enumerated comparison mode.
Gets or sets the maximum amount of memory allocated for the buffer manager that manages the buffers required by endpoints using this binding.
A 64-bit representation of a number.
Gets or sets the maximum buffer size to use.
A number representing buffer size.
Gets or sets the maximum number of messages that can be received by the web service.
A 64-bit number representing a maximum quantity.
Converts the specified <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> to a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpEndpoint"></xref>.
The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> to which web HTTP configuration settings are applied.
Not implemented.
Converts the specified <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> to a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpEndpoint"></xref>.
The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> to which web HTTP configuration settings are applied.
Not implemented.
Initializes and verifies the format of a specified channel endpoint element and configures it to include web HTTP content.
The channel endpoint element to initialize and validate.
Initializes and verifies the format of a specified service endpoint element and configures it to include web HTTP content.
The service endpoint element to initialize and validate.

Gets the collection of <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty"></xref> objects associated with the current <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebHttpEndpointElement"></xref>.
A collection of configuration properties.

Gets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotasElement"></xref> object that contains contraints on length and complexity of XML strings that are read by the XML dictionary reader.
An object that contains XML dictionary reader quotas.
Gets an element that configures the security for a web service with endpoints that receive HTTP requests.
A web service security element.
Gets or sets the WCF method of transporting data across a network between endpoints.
The three main transport modes are HTTP, TCP, and named pipes.
An enumeration of transfer modes.
Gets or sets the string to be encoded.
Encoded text.
